title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: When reopening the hyperlink builder after clicking on 'OK', the title of the hyperlink builder becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options' even after reopening it.
SR:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected Result:
- The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
